com.w2.api.engine.components.commands

Class LightMono

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w2.api.engine.components.commands.LightMono
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobotCommand, RobotComponent

    public class LightMono
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobotCommand
    The LightMono object instructs a Robot how to set the brightness of a light. This command is applicable for light components with brightness values rather instead of the full RGB range.

    The brightness threshold value is normalized between RobotComponentConstants.BRIGHTNESS_MIN and RobotComponentConstants.BRIGHTNESS_MAX
